bullets: Developed and maintained React-based web applications serving 100K+ daily active users
Led frontend architecture decisions and implemented best practices for code quality
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement responsive and accessible interfaces
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews to ensure code quality
Optimized application performance resulting in 40% faster load times
Implemented comprehensive testing strategy using Jest and React Testing Library
Built reusable component library that reduced development time by 30%
Integrated third-party APIs and services for payment processing and analytics
Participated in agile development process and sprint planning
Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js handling 1M+ requests daily
Designed and implemented database schemas in PostgreSQL and MongoDB
Developed microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes
Created automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Implemented authentication and authorization using JWT and OAuth2
Worked on real-time features using WebSockets and Redis pub/sub
Contributed to mobile app development using React Native
Performed database optimization and query tuning for better performance
Collaborated with DevOps team to improve deployment processes
Developed web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Assisted in backend development using Python and Django
Participated in debugging and troubleshooting production issues
Wrote unit tests and integration tests for new features
Documented code and created technical specifications
Worked with senior developers to implement new features
